start.description: While I was out mining, I found something strange deep under the deepslates. Infested spores and sharp shrieking sounds surrounded the area. I heard from other miners that these infestations are called $(red)sculks$(), and that I was lucky to make it out alive... However, I am fascinated by the shrieking sounds and infestations. Would it be possible for you to get me one of those $(red)sculk shriekers$() from the Deep Dark?
